label: 菩薩
対訳語: Inferior only to a Buddha in merit.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bodhisattva. Bodhisattva One who is seeking salvation with all one's might, who, because of pity, is seeking ro save the people, and who is approaching enlightenment.
